root.name: Art Academy: First Semester
root.description: OverviewAdvertised as a learning tool, Art Academy: First Semester provides 6 lessons and a range of art tools to give the user a chance to develop their real life art skills with the help of art tutor Vince and his pet dog BaconModesArt Academy: First semester has 2 main modes, Lessons and Free paint. Lessons is Art Academy: First Semesters main draw with 6 fully featured tutorials walking you through everything from sketching to painting. Free paint gives the user a range of tools to create their own masterpieces while gallery allows players to save their creations and copy them to an SD card and upload them to Facebook.ReceptionArt Academy: First Semester received generally positive critical feedback with Nintendo World Report scoring the game a 9 out of 10 praising the pacing of the lessons and accessibility while criticizing the high price.
